about_the_game:
The demo version consists of demo-only stages that re-organize some stages from the full version.

You can try five spells from them.

  • Hina Kagiyama : Misfortune Sign "Red Relief"

  • Chen : Sikigami Sign "Orange Overwrite"

  • Nitori Kawashiro : River Sign "Green Generator"

  • Cirno : Ice Sign "Blue Blizzard"

  • Kogasa Tatara : Umbrella Sign "Violet Vortex"

And more, you can battle against Marisa and Nitori !!

About this game

"SANAE's Sylphid Breeze" is a Touhou fan game with cute pixelart. With “SPELL SPOILER" she has created new ability, she inhales enemies and imitates their ability.

How shady! A mysterious shadow looms over the Moriya shrine!

Someone has attacked Lady Kanako, the goddess of the Moriya Shrine!
In addition, the symbol of the Moriya, the sacred pillar "Onbashira", has also been stolen!

The culprit could be Marisa, the familiar black-and-white thief, or the Myouren Temple, business rival, or even the Celestial with fearless smile.....!?

How strong! SANAE's new ability “SPELL SPOILER”!

With use SPELL SPOILER, she can inhale enemies that appear along the way and to get their ability. After get a new spell, SANAE transforms into the form of the enemies.

SANAE's adorable appearance drown by pixelart is also noteworthy.

name: SANAE's Sylphid Breeze Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "SANAE's Sylphid Breeze" is 2D Platformer game with cute pixelart. The main character in this game, SANAE KOCHIYA is a character from the "Touhou Project". With her new ability “SPELL SPOILER, she inhales enemies and imitates their ability. Behold! SANAE's miracle adventure!!
